title: Chocolate 2008 DVDRip H264 AAC Eng&Thai - MaubyMan
description:
OK, after years of leaching, here is my chance to give back to the bittorrent community.
This is my very first torrent. A DVD rip of Chocolate, a decent Thai action/martial arts movie.
I know this has been uploaded already, but not like this. For those of you who don't like reading
subtitles (like me) there is an English dub audio track included. For those who despise dubbed movies,
good news, there is also the original Thai audio track and subtitles included in this rip.
So everybody should be happy. Enjoy.

Note: If you are going to play this in Windows Media player without a codec pack like K-Lite installed, WMP might not play the audio correctly.
I recommend VLC or GOM Media players. Just right click, go to Audio, then select which track you want.
